description: This PHP source file generates the 'At a Glance' dashboard page for a network gateway. It includes session management, device status assessments (such as battery, network interfaces, Wi-Fi, MoCA, firewall), and dynamically outputs HTML and JavaScript to present network status, connected devices, Wi-Fi configuration, and bridge mode controls. The file also includes external resources and scripts, and interacts with device configuration parameters via functions like getStr() and KeyExtGet().

methods.name: popUp
methods.description: Opens a new window with specified URL and fixed size for detailed views or downloads.
